meanings.sent1: The man had a queer hat that was bright pink.
meanings.sent2: It was a queer sight to see a cat wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin wearing a top hat seemed quite queer.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a queer, eerie feeling to it.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious stranger had a queer smile that made everyone uneasy.

meanings.sent1: She introduced her queer friend to the group.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed a loving relationship between two queer characters.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors were surprised to learn about the couple's queer wedding plans.
meanings.sent4: Their queer love story touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The school celebrated queer pride with a colorful parade.

meanings.sent1: Please don't queer our chances of winning by being late.
meanings.sent2: The rain threatened to queer our picnic plans.
meanings.sent3: His bad joke almost queered the mood of the party.
meanings.sent4: A sudden gust of wind queered the carefully arranged flowers.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected power outage queered the presentation.
